lore: A long time ago, there was a Mutated Vampire Bat who stood out above the rest in its knowledge of magic. It owned a large mansion and enjoyed performing experiments in the company of other Bats. Needless to say, something went very wrong, and its home blew up in an emerald-green blast, giving birth to this Bat subspecies as a result. Now, Death Bats seek revenge against magic itself.
menagerieDialog: (It gently nuzzles you, which is quite discomforting considering it's a Bat.)
(It tries to nip at anyone who gets too close, including you. So moody!)
(Everett claims this creature can read, which cements your opinion that he is extremely weird.)
(It moves just a little too fast for your liking. It's unsettling.)
(It's fiddling with a piece of lint it stole from your pocket earlier.)
name: Death Bat
